## mapFailures() function

Aggregates error messages from a collection of [Result&lt;T&gt;](./ts-utils.result.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function mapFailures<T>(results: Iterable<Result<T>>, aggregatedErrors?: IMessageAggregator): string[];
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

results


</td><td>

Iterable&lt;[Result](./ts-utils.result.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt;


</td><td>

An iterable collection of [Result&lt;T&gt;](./ts-utils.result.md) for which error messages are aggregated.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

aggregatedErrors


</td><td>

[IMessageAggregator](./ts-utils.imessageaggregator.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional string array to which any returned error messages will be appended. Each error is appended as an individual string.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string\[\]

An array of strings consisting of all error messages returned by [results](./ts-utils.result.md) in the source collection. Ignores [Success](./ts-utils.success.md) results and returns an empty array if there were no errors.
